plot: A boy raised in a cemetary grows up with no social skills, and leads a turbulent life readjusting once he moves out of the cemetary.
title: Pithamagan
plot_es: A boy raised in a cemetary grows up with no social skills, and leads a turbulent life readjusting once he moves out of the cemetary.
plot_en: A boy raised in a cemetary grows up with no social skills, and leads a turbulent life readjusting once he moves out of the cemetary.
